竲字的基本解释

竲
céng
没有顶盖的楼台。
高峻。

竲
zēng
古同“橧”，巢。

竲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［céng］
［《廣韻》疾陵切，平蒸，從。］
(1)没有屋顶的楼台。
(2)高耸峻峭貌。
(3)巢高貌。又作“橧”。

竲字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【立字部】　竲； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页873第08
【廣韻】疾陵切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】慈陵切，?音嶒。高貌。　又【廣韻】作騰切【集韻】咨騰切，?音增。與橧同。【說文】北地高樓無屋者。【類篇】聚薪以居也。夏則居橧巢，或作竲。【韻會】窮高謂之竲。

竲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
竲字的起名意思

暂无。

竲
Basic explanation of words
竲
céng
Terrace without a roof.
high and steep.
竲
zēng
The ancient same "li", nest.
竲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［céng］
["Guangyun" Chi Ling cut, flat steamed, from. ]
(1) A platform without a roof.
(2) Towering and steep appearance.
(3) The nest is tall and beautiful. Also called "橧".
竲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Li Zi Department] 　竲; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 873 08
[Guang Yun] Ji Ling cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ci Ling cut,? Yin Qi. High-looking.　 [Guang Yun] Make Tengqie [Jiyun] Consult Tengqie,? Sound increases. Same as 橧. [Speaking text] People who have no houses in high-rise buildings in Northland. [Classes] Collect salary to live in. Xia is living in the nest, or as a 竲. [Rhyme Club] Poor and high is said to be 竲.
